attributes.attribute:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs-f2.ContraIndications:' var sections = { 'ICQ_COF2':[ 'ICQ_DOMHAND_COF2', 'ICQ_HNDSWL_COF2', 'ICQ_HNDCST_COF2', 'ICQ_HNDHMT_COF2', 'ICQ_ARMSWL_COF2', 'ICQ_ARMCST_COF2', 'ICQ_LEGSWL_COF2', 'ICQ_LEGCST_COF2', 'ICQ_SRG3MO_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYARM_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYCHT_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYHND_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYART_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYEYE_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYABD_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYHRT_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYOT_COF2', 'ICQ_SRGYOTSPE_COF2', 'ICQ_PAINHND_COF2', 'ICQ_RISEASSI_COF2', 'ICQ_RISECANE_COF2', 'ICQ_ABLESTND_COF2', 'ICQ_ABLEWLK_COF2', 'ICQ_PREGNT_COF2', 'ICQ_PREGNTWK_COF2', 'ICQ_ILLLUNG_COF2', 'ICQ_HRTCOND_COF2', 'ICQ_EMB6WK_COF2', 'ICQ_EMBMED_COF2', 'ICQ_DERET3MO_COF2', 'ICQ_EYEINF_COF2', 'ICQ_EARINF_COF2', 'ICQ_CATRCT_COF2', 'ICQ_CATRCTAGE_COF2', 'ICQ_CATRCTS_COF2', 'ICQ_CATRCT2_COF2', 'ICQ_CATIME_COF2', 'ICQ_GLAUC_COF2', 'ICQ_GLAUCAGE_COF2', 'ICQ_HRAID_COF2', 'ICQ_HRAID2_COF2', 'ICQ_HRWORKING_COF2', 'ICQ_GLASSES2_COF2', 'ICQ_CTLENS2_COF2', 'ICQ_GLASSES_COF2', 'ICQ_CTLENS_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSLIM_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSARM_COF2', 'ICQ_JOINTARM_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSLEG_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSHND_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSFT_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSHIP_COF2', 'ICQ_PROSKNEE_COF2', 'ICQ_PROEYE_COF2', 'ICQ_FX_COF2', 'ICQ_FXARM_COF2', 'ICQ_FXSHLD_COF2', 'ICQ_FXHND_COF2', 'ICQ_FXWRST_COF2', 'ICQ_FXRIB_COF2', 'ICQ_FXLEG_COF2', 'ICQ_FXANK_COF2', 'ICQ_FXFT_COF2', 'ICQ_FXHIP_COF2', 'ICQ_FXKNEE_COF2', 'ICQ_FXCHK_COF2', 'ICQ_FXJAW_COF2', 'ICQ_FXNOSE_COF2', 'ICQ_FXSKL_COF2', 'ICQ_FXNECK_COF2', 'ICQ_FXBACK_COF2', 'ICQ_FXCOLLR_COF2', 'ICQ_FXPELV_COF2', 'ICQ_LAMIN_COF2', 'ICQ_POLIO_COF2', 'ICQ_BLDSP3MO_COF2', 'ICQ_ANEURY_COF2', 'ICQ_PACEMKR_COF2', 'ICQ_DEFIBR_COF2', 'ICQ_COCHLIMP_COF2', 'ICQ_NGTUBE_COF2', 'ICQ_ABDTUBE_COF2', 'ICQ_CHEMO4WK_COF2', 'ICQ_HAEMO_COF2', 'ICQ_BLDTR24H_COF2', 'ICQ_NUCLMED_COF2', 'ICQ_NUCLMED_48H_COF2', 'ICQ_NUCLMED_TEST_Q_COF2', 'ICQ_NUCLMED_IV24H_COF2', 'ICQ_BARSWAL_COF2', 'ICQ_TINNIT_COF2', 'ICQ_SMOKE_COF2', 'ICQ_SMOKETIME_COF2', 'ICQ_SMOKETIMEH_COF2', 'ICQ_INHALERLONG_COF2', 'ICQ_INHALERSHORT_COF2'] }
var str = [] for(var key in sections) { var rcount = 0 var qcount = 0 var arr = sections[key] for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) { var j = $(stage + arr[i]) if(j.isNull().value()) { continue } qcount++ rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0 } if(0 == qcount) { str.push(null) } else { str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount) } } newSequence(str, 'decimal')
